    • Constructor Detail

      • WheelRenderer

        public WheelRenderer(double x,
                     double y,
                     double rad,
                     double angle)
        Construct a wheel renderer from the attached robots position.
        Parameters:
        x - The x position of the robot the wheels are attached to.
        y - The y position of the robot the wheels are attached to.
        rad - The radius of the robot the wheels are attached to.
        angle - The angle in radians of the robot the wheels are attached to.
